PHP Practice

There are two parts to this one.

  • Session
  • Cookies

Each iterates a counter based on session or cookie data. Hereâ€™s some sample code from each, respectively.

<?php
session_start();

if (isset($_SESSION["counter"])) {
  $_SESSION["counter"] += 1;
} else {
  $_SESSION["counter"] = 1;
}
?>

<?php
if (!isset($_COOKIE["counter"])) {
  setcookie("counter", 1);
  $counter = 1;
} else {
  $counter = $_COOKIE['counter'] + 1;
  setcookie("counter", $counter);
}
?>
